string.value: There's nothing betther than great bonfire as a finale of the party. But somehow, there are not enough wooden barrels to creat grand bonfire. #b#p9270058##k must work something out quickily.

#b#t4000473##k would be perfect to create a hugh flame of the bonfire. #b#p9270058##k need at least 100 of them in order make the grand finale of the party. 

#o9420535# #r#a45561##k 
#t4000473# #r#c4000473#/200#k
What a grand finale! It was the best birthday party EVER!

As the party is coming to an end, I am shocked to discover that there is not enough material to create a huge bonfire, which is the last activity of the party. Everybody is looking forward to this, and I must do whatever it takes to create a successful bonfire.
Could you hunt #b100 #o9420535##k and bring back #b100 #t4000473##k? They are the perfect materials to create the flame for the bonfire.
Thank goodness, you're here! Please hurry!
Awww...without them there won't be a grand finale to the party!
Thank goodness, you're back on time! I was just about to give up on you.
Look how wonderful the bonfire is! This is one big birthday party to remember!
Oh no, this is not enough to create a fire. I need more than this!
Only #b#o9420535##k has the perfect material to create a successful bonfire.
